rules_text:
Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Conceive costs you pay cost {1} less.
flavor_text:
[i]“No one ages or dies, elementals everywhere, workloads increasing, free land running out, [/i]food[i] running out... this world's ending, Bahum, slowly but surely.”
—Hollmont, the Gaol-Queen[/i]
